name: Ghostie Quest
description:
Ghostie Quest is back!


Can you master the pyramid of 100 levels? Tons of secrets and multiple ghosts to unlock across 4 game modes. Insanely cute! Insanely hard!

Become a family of ghosts in this spooky themed platform game. Unlock new ghosts, each new costume has it's own power. Artist ghosties can move blocks, knight ghosties can block projectiles with their shield, ninja ghosties can throw stars and much more. Multiple bosses and tons of secret levels await you. Gather lollipops and pizza to raise your score, and find plush ghostie toys to get extra lives. The farther you get the more game modes you unlock for further challenge for the most hardcore!

Local high score lists and automatic save progress ensures your hard won progress isn't lost. Can you solve the pyramid?
